p1: By sending this claim, you agree that:

ul-sw.li1: %s received support on the days they are claiming for
ul-sw.li2: %s is only claiming for support they received in the last 9 months
ul-sw.li3: Access to Work can contact you if we need more information to process %s's claim

ul-tw.li1: your employee travelled to work on the days they’re claiming for
ul-tw.li2: your employee is only claiming for journeys made in the last 9 months
ul-tw.li3: Access to Work can contact you if they require more information to process your employee’s claim
